slidelink.displaytext: Tom struggles in his current project
Mandy drafts Tom`s Improvement and Development Goals
Mandy informs both Tom and Hannah about the next steps

terms.term: Describes the concrete changes that are required from the employee and the target scenario condition that determines if improvement has occurred so that employee and manager will know if success has been achieved.

- Documents necessary actions in case current performance or behavior requires improvement - Includes a description of what must be changed and defines the target scenario condition that determines if improvement has occurred so that employee and manager will know if success has been achieved
